title: Bike Zone
metarial: React JS, Node JS, Metarial UI, Bootstrap (Simply), Firebase, CRUD Operation
info1: Users can see all the products and customer reviews without login and if he/she wanted to buy a bike he/she will login or register first.
info2: A normal user can see all his/her orders on the dashboard and can cancel the order.
info3: An admin role can make another user to an admin, update order status, delete and orders, manage products and adding a new products.

title: Poko Delivery
metarial: React JS, Node JS, Express js, Bootstrap , Firebase, CRUD Operation
info1: Users can sign in Google signin system and order a service at a time , if user needed he/she can cancel their orders.
info2: Admin can update the order status and remove an order.
info3: An admin can also add a new courier service and the service show on the home page.

title: RELAXO
metarial: React JS, React Router, Bootstrap , Firebase Authentication
info1: Users can sign in and Login in the website and see the service details.
info2: User use two kind of login or register system one is register and another google signin.
info3: User canâ€™t see the service details without login or register.
